abstract: Carlos Tévez was fined a month's pay by Manchester City for refusing to enter a game in September, but rather than accept it he is vowing to sue for defamation of character.
snippet: Carlos Tévez was fined a month's pay by Manchester City for refusing to enter a game in September, but rather than accept it he is vowing to sue for defamation of character.
lead_paragraph: The news that Manchester City has fined its sulking striker Carlos Tévez a month's pay and sentenced him, essentially, to time served as a punishment would seem to put to rest the controversy that has been a rare stain on the club's solid start to the Premier League season.

headline.main: Tévez Situation Takes Another Odd Turn
